ovdesc.p: This application stores the history of processed payment dates.

desc.p: This field represents the payment type of the property.
This field represent the actual payment date. The payments dates will be calendar days, if the payment date happens to be a holiday. Standard T24 date field
This field identifies the main Arrangement Contract number.
This field represents the financial date of the payment. This field represents the value date of the accounting entries raised during the payment.

This date can be cycled forward or backward to the next working day if the payment date falls on a holiday. This depends on the fields DATE.CONVENTION and DATE.ADJUSTMENT in the PAYMENT.SCHEDULE property. Standard T24 date field
This field holds the payment type for which payment holiday dates are maintained in HOLIDAY.DATE field. This is captured from the field HOL.PAYMENT.TYPE of Payment Schedule condition.
This field holds the holiday start date for which payment holiday dates are maintained in HOLIDAY.DATE field. This is captured from the field HOL.START.DATE of Payment Schedule condition.
This field holds the list of holiday payment dates that are to be skipped as given in the payment holiday definition of Payment Schedule condition.
This field represents the last interim capitalisation date. Standard T24 date field

This field identifies the number of times the associated payment has been processed, i.e. crossed payment date / made due. It is used in relation with NUM.PAYMENTS in Payment Schedule property class to identify number of remaining payments to be processed in future for the payment type.
This field represents the payment date. Standard T24 date field
